item.description:
Take part in wonderful event for a great cause.  The Friends of Malden Public Library will be holding their annual wine tasting at the library. 

 

 

There will be live music, an art gallery, tapas, chocolate tasting stations, and a lot of good conversation.

http://friendsofmaldenlibrary.org/?page_id=17

Tickets for the event are $35, and people are strongly urged to puchase tickets in advance as this gala always sells out early, and there are rarely, if any tickets available at the door.  Unfortunately, there is no way to reserve a ticket and pay at the door.  It would be wise to purchase your ticket as soon as possible so that you are able to attend this event.

 

Tickets can be purchased at the reference desk of the Malden Public Library    http://maldenpubliclibrary.org/blog/   call  781-324-0218 for more info

 or at M&M Liquors, 619 Broadway(Route 99), Malden, MA, 781-322-0033

http://www.facebook.com/pages/M-M-Bottled-Liquors-Inc/100505330009431

 

 

The wine tasting will wrap up at 10, after that we can head over to Exchange Street Bistro to enjoy their martini bar and other offerings.

http://exchangestreetbistro.com/

group.name: Boston Baby Boomers Meetup Group-Social Fun

item.name: 10th Annual Wine Tasting to benefit the Malden Public Library
